samples.question: When you were a child, did you think much about your future?
samples.transcript: No, when I was child, my parents thinking about my future, my mother is look after me. So I did not think about my future that time.

samples.question: Do you think you have changed as you have got older?
samples.transcript: Yes, I am changed and divided. I am growing, build up myself. cause when I was, as I am said, when I was a child, I did not think my future. But right now I think about my future and I start growing, build up myself.

So, I think, DYT getting older, there have, nothing benefits. Or other, on the other hand, lots of responsibility. I feel, there have lots of responsibility and it is, quite, like, heavy. So feel like student life or, child, child, children life is the best time.

samples.question: What is the best age for children to start computer lessons?
samples.transcript: Well, when I was start to, computer lesson that time, I am only, 12 years old and, I am starting on class six. So, in my opinion, I feel, in the, 12 or, 14 is the right time to learning study. Because that time students, are, should, more be, curiosity about, learning new things. So, they can that time easily handle any kind of things. And, their brain, that time is so, so sharp. So they can easily, learning by the computer. So 12 or 14 is the best time for learning computers.

samples.question: Could you suggest that why some people are reducing their use of technology?
samples.transcript: If I say to real example, so I can, I can telling about my father, he, he is a businessman and he used her laptop, so many times like, hours. and, sometimes I genuinely feel, he had no time for me. So, maybe technology can, people, attracted to, with them busy for doing any kind of work and they, award to their family. And also, they forget to, take care of their mental health because of, technology also, also destroyed our mental health. Cause, cause, when we spend a lot of time with, technology, that time we forget, own our, personal, personal life. So maybe, this is the main point of the reason, people reduce to technology. samples.question: How often do you buy new clothes for yourself?
samples.transcript: Not pretty often I would say. I buy my everyday wares in bulk for every two or three months apart. And as for traditional clothes or for any festivals or other events, I buy them occasionally.
samples.transcript_original: Not pretty often I would say. I buy my everyday wares in bulk for every two or three months apart. And as for traditional clothes or for any festivals or other events, I buy them occasionally.
samples.transcript_cleaned: Not pretty often I would say. I buy my everyday wares in bulk for every two or three months apart. And as for traditional clothes or for any festivals or other events, I buy them occasionally.

samples.question: How do you decide which clothes to buy?
samples.transcript: I generally go to the mall and visit my favorite brands. I explore their clothings and pick some dresses which I like. I then try them on in the trial rooms, then select. Okay.

samples.question: Would you like to start now, please?
samples.transcript: Yes, sir. Yeah. So I discussed about how I spend my money with one of my friends, Labib. I was hoping he could give me some valuable suggestions about how I can save up for my Thailand trip as I was planning to go there with my cousins. But my savings are not enough right now. I spend most of my money on foods and the rest I use buying clothes, accessories, and for my pets. So I can barely save of any money. He not only suggested many great ways to increase my income but also how I can manage my expenses So he told me about credit cards and he suggested me that many banks give loans as well and discounts at many stores He also told me that I should maintain a proper notebook to keep track of my expenses Right. Then I started doing that and since then I progressed a lot. So I think this was a very helpful and exciting conversation for me as now I can manage my finance more efficiently.

samples.question: Why do some parents give their children money to spend each week?
samples.transcript: There can be many reasons. It could be for food money. It could be for school supplies, accessories, or hanging out with their friends. Most importantly, it can be for safety purpose. If they fall in any trouble, they can help themselves out of that. Okay.
samples.transcript_original: There can be many reasons. It could be for food money. It could be for school supplies, accessories, or hanging out with their friends. Most importantly, it can be for safety purpose. If they fall in any trouble, they can help themselves out of that. Okay.

samples.question: Do you agree that the school should teach children how to manage money?
samples.transcript: Yes, I think they should because children these days are not very good at spending money. They do not know how to spend it well or efficiently and they do not really know the value of it. So if schools start teaching how to manage money, they would probably make better use of it and be more respectful to their parents' efforts.
samples.transcript_original: Yes, I think they should because children these days are not very good at spending money. They don't know how to spend it well or efficiently and they don't really know the value of it. So if schools start teaching how to manage money, they would probably make better use of it and be more respectful to their parents' efforts.
samples.transcript_cleaned: Yes, I think they should because children these days are not very good at spending money. They do not know how to spend it well or efficiently and they do not really know the value of it. So if schools start teaching how to manage money, they would probably make better use of it and be more respectful to their parents' efforts.
